hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah (bin 'Umar): Once Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) passed by an Ansari (man) who was admonishing his brother regarding Haya'. On that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Leave him as Haya' is a part of faith." (See Hadith)

chapter.eng-name: Al-Haya (self-respect, modesty bashfulness, honour etc.) is a part of faith
